ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: The Vital Signs Monitor Demo showcases a real-time vital signs monitor.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Showcases how SciChart can be used in [b]Medical Context[/b].
In this example we are simulating four channels of data showing that SciChart can be used to draw [b]real-time ECG/EKG[/b] charts and graphs to [b]monitor heart rate, body temperature, blood pressure, pulse, SPO2 blood oxygen, volumetric flow[/b] and more of [b]other vital signs[/b].
SciChart will help you to short cut your development by providing rich, real-time, high performance and reliable charts for the [b]medical and healthcare applications[/b].
In this example you can see how the [b]Line Series[/b] is used to draw real-time FIFO data. There is also the [b]Scatter Series[/b] used for a single point at the beginning of the lines. The fading effect is done with the help of [b]Palette Provider API[/b].
[b]Note:[/b] All data is a simulation.
